Docs.summary: A counting semaphore.

Docs.param: the initial number of permits available. This value may be negative, in which case releases must occur before any acquires will be granted.

Docs.summary: Acquires a permit from this semaphore, blocking until one is available, or the thread is Thread#interrupt interrupted.

Docs.exception: if the current thread is interrupted
